column4: Hi everyone, I've got a problem with editing files. I suspect that the solution will be very simple. Will anyone help me?
I'm running edgy. I don't have proper permissions to edit files on "file system".
How do I acquire these permissions?
You'll want to use something like gksudo to run a graphical editor, enter the root password when prompted and you shouldn't have a problem, just be careful with your edits :).
